```typescriptreact
// –ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—è
function ProfileHeader({ onProfileClick }: { onProfileClick: () => void }) {
  const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({
    firstName: 'Player',
    lastName: '',
    username: '',
    photoUrl: ''
  });

  // –ú–æ–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞
  const [playerStats] = useState({
    rating: 1000,
    ratingTitle: '–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π',
    balance: 0.02
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    // –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –∏–∑ Telegram WebApp
    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp?.initDataUnsafe?.user) {
      const user = window.Telegram.WebApp.initDataUnsafe.user;
      setUserInfo({
        firstName: user.first_name || 'Player',
        lastName: user.last_name || '',
        username: user.username || '',
        photoUrl: user.photo_url || ''
      });
    }
  }, []);

  const displayName = userInfo.username 
    ? `@${userInfo.username}` 
    : `${userInfo.firstName} ${userInfo.lastName}`.trim();

  return (
    <div className="profile-header">
      <div className="profile-left">
        <div className="profile-avatar">
          {userInfo.photoUrl ? (
            <img src={userInfo.photoUrl} alt="Avatar" className="avatar-img" />
          ) : (
            <span className="avatar-fallback">
              {userInfo.firstName.charAt(0)}
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
        <div className="profile-info">
          <div className="profile-name">{displayName}</div>
          <div className="profile-rating">{playerStats.rating} {playerStats.ratingTitle}</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="profile-right">
        <div className="profile-balance">
          <span className="balance-icon">üíé</span>
          <span className="balance-value">{playerStats.balance}</span>
        </div>
        <button className="profile-menu-btn" onClick={onProfileClick}>
          ‚ò∞
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// –ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
function GameCard({ game, onJoin }: { game: Game; onJoin: (gameId: number) => void }) {
  return (
    <div className="game-card">
      <div className="game-header">
        <div className="game-creator">
          <span className="creator-avatar">üé≤</span>
          <span className="creator-name">{game.creatorName}</span>
        </div>
        <div className="game-type">{game.type === '1v1' ? '1 –Ω–∞ 1' : '–õ–æ–±–±–∏'}</div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="game-details">
        <div className="game-price">
          <span className="ton-symbol">üíé</span>
          <span className="price-value">{game.price} TON</span>
        </div>
        <div className="game-players">
          {game.currentPlayers}/{game.maxPlayers} –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <button 
        className="game-join-btn"
        onClick={() => onJoin(game.id)}
        disabled={game.currentPlayers >= game.maxPlayers}
      >
        {game.currentPlayers >= game.maxPlayers ? '–ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è' : '–ò–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å'}
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}

function App() {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('play'); // 'play' | 'rating' | 'shop' | 'profile' | 'debug'
  const [gameFilter, setGameFilter] = useState<'all' | 'my'>('all');
  const [myGames, setMyGames] = useState<Game[]>([]); // –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const [allGames, setAllGames] = useState<Game[]>(mockGames); // –í—Å–µ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    // –ò–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º Telegram Web App –ø—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–µ
    initializeTelegramWebApp();
  }, []);

  // –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä
  const filteredGames = gameFilter === 'all' ? allGames : myGames;

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–µ
  const handleJoinGame = (gameId: number) => {
    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp) {
      window.Telegram.WebApp.showAlert(`–ü—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è–µ–º—Å—è –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–µ #${gameId}!`);
    }
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const handleCreateGame = () => {
    setIsCreateModalOpen(true);
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const handleGameCreate = (gameData: CreateGameData) => {
    const newGame: Game = {
      id: Date.now(), // –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π ID –¥–ª—è –¥–µ–º–æ
      creatorId: 'current_user',
      creatorName: 'Player123',
      price: gameData.price,
      maxPlayers: gameData.maxPlayers,
      currentPlayers: 1,
      isPrivate: gameData.isPrivate,
      status: 'waiting',
      type: gameData.type
    };

    // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –≤ –º–æ–∏ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
    setMyGames(prev => [...prev, newGame]);
    
    // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –∏–≥—Ä–∞ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è, –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –∏ –≤ –æ–±—â–∏–π —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫
    if (!gameData.isPrivate) {
      setAllGames(prev => [...prev, newGame]);
    }

    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp) {
      window.Telegram.WebApp.showAlert(
        `–ò–≥—Ä–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∞! –°—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞: ${gameData.price} TON, ${gameData.type === '1v1' ? '1 –Ω–∞ 1' : `–ª–æ–±–±–∏ –¥–æ ${gameData.maxPlayers} –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤`}`
      );
    }
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—è
  const handleProfileClick = () => {
    setCurrentPage('profile');
  };

  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—É
  if (currentPage === 'debug') {
    return <DebugPage onBack={() => setCurrentPage('play')} />;
  }

  // –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã
  return (
    <div className="app-container">
      {/* –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å —Å–≤–µ—Ä—Ö—É */}
      <header className="app-header">
        <ProfileHeader onProfileClick={handleProfileClick} />
      </header>

      {/* –°–∫—Ä–æ–ª–ª–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç */}
      <main className="app-content">
        {currentPage === 'play' && (
          <>
            {/* –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã –∏–≥—Ä */}
            <div className="game-filters">
              <button
                className={`game-filter-btn ${gameFilter === 'all' ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setGameFilter('all')}
              >
                –í—Å–µ
              </button>
              <button
                className={`game-filter-btn ${gameFilter === 'my' ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setGameFilter('my')}
              >
                –°–≤–æ–∏
              </button>
            </div>

            {/* –ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç –∏–≥—Ä */}
            {gameFilter === 'my' && myGames.length === 0 ? (
              <div className="empty-games">
                <div className="empty-icon">üé≤</div>
                <h3>–£ –≤–∞—Å –µ—â–µ –Ω–µ—Ç –∏–≥—Ä</h3>
                <p>–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ —Å–≤–æ—é –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –∏–≥—Ä—É –≤ –∫—É–±–∏–∫–∏!</p>
                <button className="create-game-btn" onClick={handleCreateGame}>
                  + –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏–≥—Ä—É
                </button>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <>
                {/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞ "–í—Å–µ" */}
                {gameFilter === 'all' && (
                  <div className="create-game-section">
                    <button className="create-game-btn-secondary" onClick={handleCreateGame}>
                      üéØ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∏–≥—Ä—É
                    </button>
                  </div>
                )}
                
                <div className="games-grid">
                  {filteredGames.map(game => (
                    <GameCard
                      key={game.id}
                      game={game}
                      onJoin={handleJoinGame}
                    />
                  ))}
                </div>
              </>
            )}
          </>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'rating' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üèÜ –†–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥</h2>
            <p>–¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
          </div>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'shop' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üõí –ú–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω</h2>
            <p>–ö–µ–π—Å—ã –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–º–µ—Ç—ã –ø–æ—è–≤—è—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
          </div>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'profile' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üë§ –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å</h2>
            <p>–ü–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª–µ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
            <button onClick={() => setCurrentPage('play')}>‚Üê –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥ –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞–º</button>
          </div>
        )}
      </main>

      {/* –ù–æ–≤–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é —Å 3 –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞–º–∏ */}
      <footer className="app-footer">
        <button 
          className={`footer-button ${currentPage === 'rating' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('rating')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üèÜ</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–†–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥</span>
        </button>
        
        <button 
          className={`footer-button main-button ${currentPage === 'play' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('play')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üé≤</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–ò–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å</span>
        </button>
        
        <button 
          className={`footer-button ${currentPage === 'shop' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('shop')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üõí</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–ú–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω</span>
        </button>

        {/* –°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ - –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∂–∞—Ç–∏–µ */}
        <button 
          className="debug-access-btn"
          onTouchStart={(e) => {
            const timer = setTimeout(() => setCurrentPage('debug'), 2000);
            e.currentTarget.dataset.timer = timer.toString();
          }}
          onTouchEnd={(e) => {
            const timer = e.currentTarget.dataset.timer;
            if (timer) clearTimeout(parseInt(timer));
          }}
        />
      </footer>

      {/* –ú–æ–¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–∫–Ω–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä—ã */}
      <CreateGameModal
        isOpen={isCreateModalOpen}
        onClose={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(false)}
        onCreate={handleGameCreate}
      />
    </div>
  );
}

export default App; 
```

```css
/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {

  --color-base-bg: #1a1a2e;

  /* –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ */
  --text-color-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-color-secondary: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);

  /* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-divider: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-filter-badge-bg: #2481cc;

  /* –ò–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-game-card-bg: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.1);

  /* –¢–µ–Ω–∏ */
  --shadow-light: 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

  --shadow-heavy: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --shadow-game-card: 0 4px 15px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  
  /* Telegram Safe Areas - —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è SDK –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ */
  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));
  --safe-bottom: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-bottom, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-bottom, env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px)));
  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));
  --safe-right: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-right, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-right, env(safe-area-inset-right, 0px)));
  
  /* –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤—ã—Å–æ—Ç–∞ viewport –æ—Ç Telegram */
  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);
}

/* –°–±—Ä–æ—Å —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π */

  margin: 0;

}

/* –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è */
.app-container {

  opacity: 0.6;
}

.empty-games h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.empty-games p {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  max-width: 280px;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.create-game-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –°–¢–†–ê–ù–ò–¶–´ */
.page-content {
  padding: 2rem 1rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-content h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg), #667eea);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.page-content p {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.page-content button {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* –ù–û–í–û–ï –ú–ï–ù–Æ –° 3 –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê–ú–ò */
.app-footer {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: var(--safe-bottom);
  left: var(--safe-left);
  right: var(--safe-right);
  background: var(--color-secondary-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.75rem);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: end;
  gap: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –º–µ–Ω—é */
.footer-button {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 80px;
  height: 56px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 8px 4px;
  position: relative;
}

/* –¶–ï–ù–¢–†–ê–õ–¨–ù–ê–Ø –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê "–ò–ì–†–ê–¢–¨" –í–´–®–ï –î–†–£–ì–ò–• */
.footer-button.main-button {
  height: 76px;
  width: 76px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-16px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
  border: 4px solid var(--color-base-bg);
  margin: 0 16px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-icon {
  font-size: 28px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-text {
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.footer-button:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.footer-button.main-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-18px) scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

.footer-button:active {
  transform: scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.main-button:active {
  transform: translateY(-16px) scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.active:not(.main-button) {
  background: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.3);
}

.footer-icon {
  font-size: 22px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.footer-text {
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1;
}

/* –°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ */
.debug-access-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: -20px;
  right: 10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  opacity: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* –û—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–∫–∏ */
.debug-page {
  width: 100%;
  height: var(--stable-height);
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2c2c54 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #2c2c54 100%);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.debug-grid {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(50px, 1fr));
  gap: 2px;
  padding: var(--safe-top) var(--safe-right) var(--safe-bottom) var(--safe-left);
}

.debug-container {
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
  min-height: 60px;
}

.debug-container:nth-child(odd) {
  background: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.5);
}

.debug-container:nth-child(even) {
  background: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.5);
}

.debug-label {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.debug-zones {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.debug-zone {
  position: absolute;
  border: 2px dashed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.debug-zone.top {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-top);
  border-color: #ff6b6b;
  background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.2);
  color: #ff6b6b;
}

.debug-zone.bottom {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-bottom);
  border-color: #feca57;
  background: rgba(254, 202, 87, 0.2);
  color: #feca57;
}

.debug-zone.left {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-left);
  border-color: #48dbfb;
  background: rgba(72, 219, 251, 0.2);
  color: #48dbfb;
}

.debug-zone.right {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-right);
  border-color: #ff9ff3;
  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);
  right: calc(var(--safe-right) + 10px);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.debug-back-btn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 20px);
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.debug-back-btn:hover {
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.modal-header h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    padding: 0.4rem 0.75rem;
    padding-top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 0.4rem);
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 36px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    font-size: 7px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 7px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
    top: calc(44px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(90px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .games-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .game-card {
    padding: 14px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 68px;
    width: 68px;
    transform: translateY(-14px);
    margin: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-16px) scale(1.05);
  }
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–∞ */
@media (orientation: landscape) and (max-height: 500px) {
  .app-header {
    padding: 0.3rem 0.5rem;
    padding-top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 0.3rem);
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 32px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    font-size: 6px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 6px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    top: calc(38px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(80px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    transform: translateY(-12px);
  }
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.game-card {
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.game-filter-btn:focus,
.game-join-btn:focus,
.footer-button:focus,
.profile-menu-btn:focus,
.create-game-btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--text-color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --color-base-bg: #ffffff;
    --color-secondary-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    --color-input-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --text-color-primary: #000000;
    --text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    --color-divider: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-text: #000000;
  }
}

.game-card,
.game-filter-btn,

.profile-menu-btn,
.create-game-btn {
  will-change: transform;

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */
```

```css
/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {

  --color-divider: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);

  /* –ò–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-game-card-bg: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.1);

  /* Telegram Safe Areas - —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è SDK –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ */
  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));
  --safe-bottom: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-bottom, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-bottom, env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px)));
  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));
  --safe-right: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-right, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-right, env(safe-area-inset-right, 0px)));
  
  /* –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤—ã—Å–æ—Ç–∞ viewport –æ—Ç Telegram */
  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);
}

/* –°–±—Ä–æ—Å —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π */
* {

/* –ö–û–ù–¢–ï–ù–¢ */
.app-content {

/* –û—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–∫–∏ */
.debug-page {

.debug-container {

}

.debug-container:nth-child(even) {
  background: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.1);

  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

  font-size: 20px;

}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;

  border-radius: 50%;

  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  .balance-icon {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(90px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .games-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .game-card {
    padding: 14px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 68px;
    width: 68px;
    transform: translateY(-14px);
    margin: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-16px) scale(1.05);
  }
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–∞ */
@media (orientation: landscape) and (max-height: 500px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    padding: 4px 6px;
    border-radius: 8px;
  }
  
  .balance-icon {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(80px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    transform: translateY(-12px);
  }
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.game-card {
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.game-filter-btn:focus,
.game-join-btn:focus,
.footer-button:focus,
.profile-menu-btn:focus,
.create-game-btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--text-color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --color-base-bg: #ffffff;
    --color-secondary-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    --color-input-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --text-color-primary: #000000;
    --text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    --color-divider: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-text: #000000;
  }
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
.game-card,
.game-filter-btn,
.footer-button,
.profile-menu-btn,
.create-game-btn {
  will-change: transform;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi) {
  .game-card {
    border-width: 0.5px;
  }
} 
```

```typescriptreact
        contentSafeAreaInset?: { top: number; bottom: number; left: number; right: number };

// –ò–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è Telegram Web App
function initializeTelegramWebApp() {
  if (window.Telegram?.WebApp) {
    // –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–∏–º –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ
    window.Telegram.WebApp.ready();
    
    // –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä—è–µ–º –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—å —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω
    window.Telegram.WebApp.expand();
    
    // –î–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ —Å –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–µ–π 8.0+
    if (
      window.Telegram.WebApp.isVersionAtLeast("8.0") &&
      window.Telegram.WebView &&
      isMobileAndTabletCheck()
    ) {
      // –ë–ª–æ–∫–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –æ—Ä–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é
      window.Telegram.WebApp.lockOrientation();
      
      // –ó–∞–ø—Ä–∞—à–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º
      window.Telegram.WebView.postEvent("web_app_request_fullscreen");
    }
    
    // –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞
    window.Telegram.WebApp.setHeaderColor('#1a1a2e');
    window.Telegram.WebApp.setBackgroundColor('#1a1a2e');
    
    // –í–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏—è
    window.Telegram.WebApp.enableClosingConfirmation();
    
    // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∏ —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π –¥–ª—è safe areas
    const handleSafeAreaChanged = () => {
      console.log('Safe area changed:', window.Telegram.WebApp.safeAreaInset);
    };
    
    const handleContentSafeAreaChanged = () => {
      console.log('Content safe area changed:', window.Telegram.WebApp.contentSafeAreaInset);
    };
    
    const handleViewportChanged = () => {
      console.log('Viewport changed:', {
        height: window.Telegram.WebApp.viewportHeight,
        stableHeight: window.Telegram.WebApp.viewportStableHeight
      });
    };
    
    // –ü—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ–º —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –æ–Ω–∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã)
    if (window.Telegram.WebApp.onEvent) {
      window.Telegram.WebApp.onEvent('safeAreaChanged', handleSafeAreaChanged);
      window.Telegram.WebApp.onEvent('contentSafeAreaChanged', handleContentSafeAreaChanged);
      window.Telegram.WebApp.onEvent('viewportChanged', handleViewportChanged);
    }
    
    // –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏
    console.log('Telegram WebApp initialized:', {
      version: window.Telegram.WebApp.version,
      platform: window.Telegram.WebApp.platform,
      isFullscreen: window.Telegram.WebApp.isFullscreen,
      viewportHeight: window.Telegram.WebApp.viewportHeight,
      viewportStableHeight: window.Telegram.WebApp.viewportStableHeight,
      safeAreaInset: window.Telegram.WebApp.safeAreaInset,
      contentSafeAreaInset: window.Telegram.WebApp.contentSafeAreaInset
    });
  }
}

function ProfileHeader({ onProfileClick }: { onProfileClick: () => void }) {
  const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({
    firstName: 'Player',
    lastName: '',
    username: '',
    photoUrl: ''
  });

  // –ú–æ–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–∞
  const [playerStats] = useState({
    rating: 1000,
    ratingTitle: '–°—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π',
    balance: 0.02
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    // –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –∏–∑ Telegram WebApp
    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp?.initDataUnsafe?.user) {
      const user = window.Telegram.WebApp.initDataUnsafe.user;
      setUserInfo({
        firstName: user.first_name || 'Player',
        lastName: user.last_name || '',
        username: user.username || '',

// –ö–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
function GameCard({ game, onJoin }: { game: Game; onJoin: (gameId: number) => void }) {
  return (
    <div className="game-card">
      <div className="game-header">
        <div className="game-creator">
          <span className="creator-avatar">üé≤</span>
          <span className="creator-name">{game.creatorName}</span>
        </div>
        <div className="game-type">{game.type === '1v1' ? '1 –Ω–∞ 1' : '–õ–æ–±–±–∏'}</div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="game-details">
        <div className="game-price">
          <span className="ton-symbol">üíé</span>
          <span className="price-value">{game.price} TON</span>
        </div>
        <div className="game-players">
          {game.currentPlayers}/{game.maxPlayers} –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <button 
        className="game-join-btn"
        onClick={() => onJoin(game.id)}
        disabled={game.currentPlayers >= game.maxPlayers}
      >
        {game.currentPlayers >= game.maxPlayers ? '–ü–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è' : '–ò–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å'}
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}

function App() {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('play'); // 'play' | 'rating' | 'shop' | 'profile' | 'debug'
  const [gameFilter, setGameFilter] = useState<'all' | 'my'>('all');
  const [myGames, setMyGames] = useState<Game[]>([]); // –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const [allGames, setAllGames] = useState<Game[]>(mockGames); // –í—Å–µ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    // –ò–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º Telegram Web App –ø—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–µ
    initializeTelegramWebApp();
  }, []);

  // –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä
  const filteredGames = gameFilter === 'all' ? allGames : myGames;

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–µ
  const handleJoinGame = (gameId: number) => {
    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp) {
      window.Telegram.WebApp.showAlert(`–ü—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è–µ–º—Å—è –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–µ #${gameId}!`);
    }
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const handleCreateGame = () => {
    setIsCreateModalOpen(true);
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏–≥—Ä—ã
  const handleGameCreate = (gameData: CreateGameData) => {
    const newGame: Game = {
      id: Date.now(), // –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π ID –¥–ª—è –¥–µ–º–æ
      creatorId: 'current_user',
      creatorName: 'Player123',
      price: gameData.price,
      maxPlayers: gameData.maxPlayers,
      currentPlayers: 1,
      isPrivate: gameData.isPrivate,
      status: 'waiting',
      type: gameData.type
    };

    // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –≤ –º–æ–∏ –∏–≥—Ä—ã
    setMyGames(prev => [...prev, newGame]);
    
    // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –∏–≥—Ä–∞ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è, –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –∏ –≤ –æ–±—â–∏–π —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫
    if (!gameData.isPrivate) {
      setAllGames(prev => [...prev, newGame]);
    }

    if (window.Telegram?.WebApp) {
      window.Telegram.WebApp.showAlert(
        `–ò–≥—Ä–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∞! –°—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞: ${gameData.price} TON, ${gameData.type === '1v1' ? '1 –Ω–∞ 1' : `–ª–æ–±–±–∏ –¥–æ ${gameData.maxPlayers} –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤`}`
      );
    }
  };

  // –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—è
  const handleProfileClick = () => {
    setCurrentPage('profile');
  };

  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—É—é —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—É
  if (currentPage === 'debug') {
    return <DebugPage onBack={() => setCurrentPage('play')} />;
  }

  // –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã
  return (
    <div className="app-container">
      {/* –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å —Å–≤–µ—Ä—Ö—É */}
      <header className="app-header">
        <ProfileHeader onProfileClick={handleProfileClick} />
      </header>

      {/* –°–∫—Ä–æ–ª–ª–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç */}
      <main className="app-content">
        {currentPage === 'play' && (
          <>
            {/* –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã –∏–≥—Ä */}
            <div className="game-filters">
              <button
                className={`game-filter-btn ${gameFilter === 'all' ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setGameFilter('all')}
              >
                –í—Å–µ
              </button>
              <button
                className={`game-filter-btn ${gameFilter === 'my' ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setGameFilter('my')}
              >
                –°–≤–æ–∏
              </button>
            </div>

            {/* –ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç –∏–≥—Ä */}
            {gameFilter === 'my' && myGames.length === 0 ? (
              <div className="empty-games">
                <div className="empty-icon">üé≤</div>
                <h3>–£ –≤–∞—Å –µ—â–µ –Ω–µ—Ç –∏–≥—Ä</h3>
                <p>–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ —Å–≤–æ—é –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –∏–≥—Ä—É –≤ –∫—É–±–∏–∫–∏!</p>
                <button className="create-game-btn" onClick={handleCreateGame}>
                  + –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏–≥—Ä—É
                </button>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <>
                {/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞ "–í—Å–µ" */}
                {gameFilter === 'all' && (
                  <div className="create-game-section">
                    <button className="create-game-btn-secondary" onClick={handleCreateGame}>
                      üéØ –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∏–≥—Ä—É
                    </button>
                  </div>
                )}
                
                <div className="games-grid">
                  {filteredGames.map(game => (
                    <GameCard
                      key={game.id}
                      game={game}
                      onJoin={handleJoinGame}
                    />
                  ))}
                </div>
              </>
            )}
          </>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'rating' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üèÜ –†–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥</h2>
            <p>–¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
          </div>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'shop' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üõí –ú–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω</h2>
            <p>–ö–µ–π—Å—ã –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–º–µ—Ç—ã –ø–æ—è–≤—è—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
          </div>
        )}

        {currentPage === 'profile' && (
          <div className="page-content">
            <h2>üë§ –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å</h2>
            <p>–ü–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª–µ –ø–æ—è–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ!</p>
            <button onClick={() => setCurrentPage('play')}>‚Üê –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥ –∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞–º</button>
          </div>
        )}
      </main>

      {/* –ù–æ–≤–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é —Å 3 –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞–º–∏ */}
      <footer className="app-footer">
        <button 
          className={`footer-button ${currentPage === 'rating' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('rating')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üèÜ</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–†–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥</span>
        </button>
        
        <button 
          className={`footer-button main-button ${currentPage === 'play' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('play')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üé≤</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–ò–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å</span>
        </button>
        
        <button 
          className={`footer-button ${currentPage === 'shop' ? 'active' : ''}`}
          onClick={() => setCurrentPage('shop')}
        >
          <span className="footer-icon">üõí</span>
          <span className="footer-text">–ú–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω</span>
        </button>

        {/* –°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ - –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∂–∞—Ç–∏–µ */}
        <button 
          className="debug-access-btn"
          onTouchStart={(e) => {
            const timer = setTimeout(() => setCurrentPage('debug'), 2000);
            e.currentTarget.dataset.timer = timer.toString();
          }}
          onTouchEnd={(e) => {
            const timer = e.currentTarget.dataset.timer;
            if (timer) clearTimeout(parseInt(timer));
          }}
        />
      </footer>

      {/* –ú–æ–¥–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–∫–Ω–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–≥—Ä—ã */}
      <CreateGameModal
        isOpen={isCreateModalOpen}
        onClose={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(false)}
        onCreate={handleGameCreate}
      />
    </div>
  );
}

export default App;
```

```css
/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {

  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));

  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));

  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);

  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.debug-zones {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.debug-zone {
  position: absolute;
  border: 2px dashed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.debug-zone.top {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-top);
  border-color: #ff6b6b;
  background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.2);
  color: #ff6b6b;
}

.debug-zone.bottom {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-bottom);
  border-color: #feca57;
  background: rgba(254, 202, 87, 0.2);
  color: #feca57;
}

.debug-zone.left {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-left);
  border-color: #48dbfb;
  background: rgba(72, 219, 251, 0.2);
  color: #48dbfb;
}

.debug-zone.right {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-right);
  border-color: #ff9ff3;
  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);
  right: calc(var(--safe-right) + 10px);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.debug-back-btn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 20px);
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.debug-back-btn:hover {
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.modal-header h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  .balance-icon {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(90px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .games-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .game-card {
    padding: 14px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 68px;
    width: 68px;
    transform: translateY(-14px);
    margin: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-16px) scale(1.05);
  }
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–∞ */
@media (orientation: landscape) and (max-height: 500px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    padding: 4px 6px;
    border-radius: 8px;
  }
  
  .balance-icon {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(80px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    transform: translateY(-12px);
  }
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.game-card {
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.game-filter-btn:focus,
.game-join-btn:focus,
.footer-button:focus,
.profile-menu-btn:focus,
.create-game-btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--text-color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --color-base-bg: #ffffff;
    --color-secondary-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    --color-input-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --text-color-primary: #000000;
    --text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    --color-divider: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-text: #000000;
  }
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
.game-card,
.game-filter-btn,
.footer-button,
.profile-menu-btn,
.create-game-btn {
  will-change: transform;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi) {
  .game-card {
    border-width: 0.5px;
  }
}
```
