  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.game-filter-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.game-filter-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-text);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

/* –ö–ê–†–¢–û–ß–ö–ò –ò–ì–† */
.games-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr));
  gap: 16px;
  padding: 0;
}

.game-card {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.game-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.game-creator {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}

.creator-avatar {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.creator-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.game-type {
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 4px 8px;
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-text);
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.game-details {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.game-price {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
}

.ton-symbol {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.price-value {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.game-players {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.game-join-btn {
  width: 100%;
  height: 44px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.game-join-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

.game-join-btn:disabled {
  background: var(--color-divider);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* –ü–£–°–¢–û–ï –°–û–°–¢–û–Ø–ù–ò–ï */
.empty-games {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px 24px;
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  min-height: 300px;
}

.empty-icon {
  font-size: 64px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  opacity: 0.6;
}

.empty-games h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.empty-games p {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  max-width: 280px;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.create-game-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –°–¢–†–ê–ù–ò–¶–´ */
.page-content {
  padding: 2rem 1rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-content h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg), #667eea);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.page-content p {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.page-content button {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* –ù–û–í–û–ï –ú–ï–ù–Æ –° 3 –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê–ú–ò */
.app-footer {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: var(--safe-bottom);
  left: var(--safe-left);
  right: var(--safe-right);
  background: var(--color-secondary-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.75rem);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: end;
  gap: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –º–µ–Ω—é */
.footer-button {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 80px;
  height: 56px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 8px 4px;
  position: relative;
}

/* –¶–ï–ù–¢–†–ê–õ–¨–ù–ê–Ø –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê "–ò–ì–†–ê–¢–¨" –í–´–®–ï –î–†–£–ì–ò–• */
.footer-button.main-button {
  height: 76px;
  width: 76px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-16px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
  border: 4px solid var(--color-base-bg);
  margin: 0 16px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-icon {
  font-size: 28px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-text {
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.footer-button:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.footer-button.main-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-18px) scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

.footer-button:active {
  transform: scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.main-button:active {
  transform: translateY(-16px) scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.active:not(.main-button) {
  background: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.3);
}

.footer-icon {
  font-size: 22px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.footer-text {
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1;
}

/* –°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ */
.debug-access-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: -20px;
  right: 10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  opacity: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* –û—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–∫–∏ */
.debug-page {
  width: 100%;
  height: var(--stable-height);
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2c2c54 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #2c2c54 100%);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.debug-grid {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(50px, 1fr));
  gap: 2px;
  padding: var(--safe-top) var(--safe-right) var(--safe-bottom) var(--safe-left);
}

.debug-container {
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
  min-height: 60px;
}

.debug-container:nth-child(odd) {
  background: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.5);
}

.debug-container:nth-child(even) {
  background: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.5);
}

.debug-label {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.debug-zones {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.debug-zone {
  position: absolute;
  border: 2px dashed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.debug-zone.top {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-top);
  border-color: #ff6b6b;
  background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.2);
  color: #ff6b6b;
}

.debug-zone.bottom {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-bottom);
  border-color: #feca57;
  background: rgba(254, 202, 87, 0.2);
  color: #feca57;
}

.debug-zone.left {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-left);
  border-color: #48dbfb;
  background: rgba(72, 219, 251, 0.2);
  color: #48dbfb;
}

.debug-zone.right {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-right);
  border-color: #ff9ff3;
  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);
  right: calc(var(--safe-right) + 10px);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.debug-back-btn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 20px);
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.debug-back-btn:hover {
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.modal-header h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .avatar-img {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    height: 30px;
    padding: 0 6px;
    gap: 3px;
  }
  
  .balance-ton-icon {
    width: 14px;

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */

.game-join-btn:focus,

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */

  will-change: transform;

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */

/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {

  --color-base-bg: #1a1a2e;

  /* –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ */
  --text-color-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-color-secondary: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
  --text-color-accent: #2481cc;
  --text-color-error: #ff6b6b;

  --color-divider: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-filter-badge-bg: #2481cc;
  --color-filter-badge-text: #ffffff;
  --color-slider-track-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  
  /* –ò–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-game-card-bg: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.1);

  --color-ton-accent: #ffd700;

  --shadow-game-card: 0 4px 15px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  
  /* Telegram Safe Areas - —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è SDK –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ */
  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));
  --safe-bottom: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-bottom, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-bottom, env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px)));
  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));
  --safe-right: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-right, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-right, env(safe-area-inset-right, 0px)));
  
  /* –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤—ã—Å–æ—Ç–∞ viewport –æ—Ç Telegram */
  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);
}

/* –°–±—Ä–æ—Å —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π */
* {
  margin: 0;

/* –û—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–∫–∏ */
.debug-page {

  height: var(--stable-height);
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2c2c54 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #2c2c54 100%);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.debug-grid {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(50px, 1fr));
  gap: 2px;
  padding: var(--safe-top) var(--safe-right) var(--safe-bottom) var(--safe-left);
}

.debug-container {
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
  min-height: 60px;
}

.debug-container:nth-child(odd) {
  background: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.5);
}

.debug-container:nth-child(even) {
  background: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.5);
}

.debug-label {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.debug-zones {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.debug-zone {
  position: absolute;
  border: 2px dashed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.debug-zone.top {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-top);
  border-color: #ff6b6b;
  background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.2);
  color: #ff6b6b;
}

.debug-zone.bottom {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-bottom);
  border-color: #feca57;
  background: rgba(254, 202, 87, 0.2);
  color: #feca57;
}

.debug-zone.left {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-left);
  border-color: #48dbfb;
  background: rgba(72, 219, 251, 0.2);
  color: #48dbfb;
}

.debug-zone.right {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-right);
  border-color: #ff9ff3;
  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);
  right: calc(var(--safe-right) + 10px);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.debug-back-btn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 20px);
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.debug-back-btn:hover {
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.modal-header h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .avatar-img {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    height: 30px;
    padding: 0 6px;
    gap: 3px;
  }
  
  .balance-ton-icon {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .balance-add-icon {
    width: 14px !important;
    height: 14px !important;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn svg {
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(90px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .games-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .game-card {
    padding: 14px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 68px;
    width: 68px;
    transform: translateY(-14px);
    margin: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-16px) scale(1.05);
  }
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–∞ */
@media (orientation: landscape) and (max-height: 500px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 26px !important;
    height: 26px !important;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .avatar-img {
    width: 26px !important;
    height: 26px !important;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    height: 26px;
    padding: 0 5px;
    gap: 2px;
  }
  
  .balance-ton-icon {
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .balance-add-icon {
    width: 14px !important;
    height: 14px !important;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 26px;
    height: 26px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(80px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    transform: translateY(-12px);
  }
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.game-card {
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.game-filter-btn:focus,
.game-join-btn:focus,
.footer-button:focus,
.profile-menu-btn:focus,
.create-game-btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--text-color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --color-base-bg: #ffffff;
    --color-secondary-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    --color-input-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --text-color-primary: #000000;
    --text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    --color-divider: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-text: #000000;
  }
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
.game-card,
.game-filter-btn,
.footer-button,
.profile-menu-btn,
.create-game-btn {
  will-change: transform;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi) {
  .game-card {
    border-width: 0.5px;
  }
}

/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {
  /* –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-base-bg: #1a1a2e;
  --color-secondary-bg: rgba(26, 26, 46, 0.95);
  --color-input-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-primary-button-bg: #2481cc;
  --color-primary-button-text: #ffffff;
  --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-secondary-button-text: #ffffff;
  
  /* –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ */
  --text-color-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-color-secondary: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
  --text-color-accent: #2481cc;
  --text-color-error: #ff6b6b;
  --text-color-success: #51cf66;
  --text-color-light: #ffffff;
  --text-color-dark: #000000;
  
  /* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-divider: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-filter-badge-bg: #2481cc;
  --color-filter-badge-text: #ffffff;
  --color-slider-track-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  
  /* –ò–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-game-card-bg: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.1);
  --color-game-card-border: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.3);
  --color-ton-accent: #ffd700;
  --color-win: #51cf66;
  --color-lose: #ff6b6b;
  
  /* –¢–µ–Ω–∏ */
  --shadow-light: 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  --shadow-medium: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --shadow-heavy: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --shadow-game-card: 0 4px 15px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  
  /* Telegram Safe Areas - —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è SDK –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ */
  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));
  --safe-bottom: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-bottom, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-bottom, env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px)));
  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));
  --safe-right: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-right, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-right, env(safe-area-inset-right, 0px)));
  
  /* –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤—ã—Å–æ—Ç–∞ viewport –æ—Ç Telegram */
  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);
}

/* –°–±—Ä–æ—Å —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  overscroll-behavior: none !important;
}

body {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Roboto', 'Oxygen',
    'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue',
    sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è */
.app-container {
  width: 100vw;
  height: var(--stable-height);
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* –ü–†–û–§–ò–õ–¨ –°–í–ï–†–•–£ */
.app-header {
  position: fixed;
  top: var(--safe-top);
  left: var(--safe-left);
  right: var(--safe-right);
  background: var(--color-secondary-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  padding: 0;
  padding-top: var(--safe-top);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  z-index: 1000;
  overflow: hidden;
  height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
}

.profile-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  width: 100%;
  height: 54px;
  padding: 0 16px;
}

.profile-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.profile-avatar {
  width: 34px !important;
  height: 34px !important;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 600;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.avatar-img {
  width: 34px !important;
  height: 34px !important;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.avatar-fallback {
  color: white;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.profile-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 2px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.profile-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  line-height: 1;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.profile-rating {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.profile-right {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  height: 34px;
  align-self: center;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.profile-balance {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.balance-container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.balance-ton-icon {
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  width: 22px;
  height: 22px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.balance-value {
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.balance-add-icon {
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  width: 14px !important;
  height: 14px !important;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  opacity: 0.7;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease;
}

.profile-menu-btn {
  width: 34px;
  height: 34px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.profile-menu-btn svg {
  width: 18px;
  height: 18px;
}

.profile-menu-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* –ö–û–ù–¢–ï–ù–¢ */
.app-content {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  left: var(--safe-left);
  right: var(--safe-right);
  bottom: calc(100px + var(--safe-bottom));
  overflow-y: auto;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  scrollbar-width: thin;
  scrollbar-color: var(--color-secondary-button-bg) transparent;
}

.app-content::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 4px;
}

.app-content::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: transparent;
}

.app-content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* –§–ò–õ–¨–¢–†–´ –ò–ì–† */
.game-filters {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.game-filter-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  padding: 0 20px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--color-secondary-button-text);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.game-filter-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.game-filter-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-text);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

/* –ö–ê–†–¢–û–ß–ö–ò –ò–ì–† */
.games-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr));
  gap: 16px;
  padding: 0;
}

.game-card {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.game-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.game-creator {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}

.creator-avatar {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.creator-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.game-type {
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 4px 8px;
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-text);
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.game-details {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.game-price {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
}

.ton-symbol {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.price-value {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.game-players {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.game-join-btn {
  width: 100%;
  height: 44px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.game-join-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

.game-join-btn:disabled {
  background: var(--color-divider);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* –ü–£–°–¢–û–ï –°–û–°–¢–û–Ø–ù–ò–ï */
.empty-games {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px 24px;
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  min-height: 300px;
}

.empty-icon {
  font-size: 64px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  opacity: 0.6;
}

.empty-games h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.empty-games p {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  max-width: 280px;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.create-game-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –°–¢–†–ê–ù–ò–¶–´ */
.page-content {
  padding: 2rem 1rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-content h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg), #667eea);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.page-content p {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 24px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.page-content button {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* –ù–û–í–û–ï –ú–ï–ù–Æ –° 3 –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê–ú–ò */
.app-footer {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: var(--safe-bottom);
  left: var(--safe-left);
  right: var(--safe-right);
  background: var(--color-secondary-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.75rem);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: end;
  gap: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –º–µ–Ω—é */
.footer-button {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 80px;
  height: 56px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 8px 4px;
  position: relative;
}

/* –¶–ï–ù–¢–†–ê–õ–¨–ù–ê–Ø –ö–ù–û–ü–ö–ê "–ò–ì–†–ê–¢–¨" –í–´–®–ï –î–†–£–ì–ò–• */
.footer-button.main-button {
  height: 76px;
  width: 76px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-16px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
  border: 4px solid var(--color-base-bg);
  margin: 0 16px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-icon {
  font-size: 28px;
}

.footer-button.main-button .footer-text {
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.footer-button:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.footer-button.main-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-18px) scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

.footer-button:active {
  transform: scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.main-button:active {
  transform: translateY(-16px) scale(0.95);
}

.footer-button.active:not(.main-button) {
  background: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.3);
}

.footer-icon {
  font-size: 22px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.footer-text {
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1;
}

/* –°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏ */
.debug-access-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: -20px;
  right: 10px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  opacity: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* –û—Ç–ª–∞–¥–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–µ—Ç–∫–∏ */
.debug-page {
  width: 100%;
  height: var(--stable-height);
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #2c2c54 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #2c2c54 100%);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.debug-grid {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(50px, 1fr));
  gap: 2px;
  padding: var(--safe-top) var(--safe-right) var(--safe-bottom) var(--safe-left);
}

.debug-container {
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
  min-height: 60px;
}

.debug-container:nth-child(odd) {
  background: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(72, 187, 120, 0.5);
}

.debug-container:nth-child(even) {
  background: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.1);
  border-color: rgba(66, 153, 225, 0.5);
}

.debug-label {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.debug-zones {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.debug-zone {
  position: absolute;
  border: 2px dashed;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.debug-zone.top {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-top);
  border-color: #ff6b6b;
  background: rgba(255, 107, 107, 0.2);
  color: #ff6b6b;
}

.debug-zone.bottom {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: var(--safe-bottom);
  border-color: #feca57;
  background: rgba(254, 202, 87, 0.2);
  color: #feca57;
}

.debug-zone.left {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-left);
  border-color: #48dbfb;
  background: rgba(72, 219, 251, 0.2);
  color: #48dbfb;
}

.debug-zone.right {
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: var(--safe-right);
  border-color: #ff9ff3;
  background: rgba(255, 159, 243, 0.2);
  color: #ff9ff3;
}

.debug-info {
  position: fixed;
  top: calc(var(--safe-top) + 10px);
  left: calc(var(--safe-left) + 10px);
  right: calc(var(--safe-right) + 10px);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 11px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.debug-back-btn {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 20px);
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.debug-back-btn:hover {
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.4);
}

/* –ú–û–î–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ö–ù–û –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ò–ì–†–´ */
.modal-overlay {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  z-index: 2000;
  padding: 1rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

.modal-content {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 400px;
  width: 100%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-game-card-border);
  box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: modalSlideIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes modalSlideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.modal-header h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.modal-close-btn {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.modal-close-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.create-game-form {
  padding: 0 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.form-group label {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ –∏–≥—Ä—ã */
.game-type-buttons {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 12px;
}

.game-type-btn {
  padding: 16px 12px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 2px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  text-align: center;
}

.game-type-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.game-type-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-game-card-bg);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-game-card);
}

.type-icon {
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 1;
}

.type-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.type-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

/* –°–µ–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–≥—Ä–æ–∫–æ–≤ */
.players-selector {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.player-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 44px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.player-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.player-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

/* –í–≤–æ–¥ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã */
.price-input-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 0 16px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.price-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-weight: 400;
}

.price-suggestions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 6px;
}

.price-suggestion {
  flex: 1;
  height: 36px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.price-suggestion:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: var(--color-ton-accent);
}

.price-suggestion.active {
  background: var(--color-ton-accent);
  color: black;
  border-color: var(--color-ton-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∞—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.privacy-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  flex-direction: row !important;
}

.privacy-label:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.privacy-title {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
}

.privacy-desc {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-secondary);
}

.privacy-toggle {
  position: relative;
  width: 48px;
  height: 28px;
}

.privacy-checkbox {
  display: none;
}

.toggle-slider {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 14px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.toggle-slider::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  left: 4px;
  top: 4px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider {
  background: var(--color-primary-button-bg);
}

.privacy-checkbox:checked + .toggle-slider::before {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}

/* –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π */
.modal-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.cancel-btn {
  flex: 1;
  height: 48px;
  background: var(--color-secondary-button-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-divider);
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: var(--color-lose);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--color-lose);
}

.create-btn {
  flex: 2;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-win) 0%, #51cf66 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è */
.create-game-section {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.create-game-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-button-bg) 0%, #667eea 100%);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 12px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.create-game-btn-secondary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .avatar-img {
    width: 30px !important;
    height: 30px !important;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 13px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    height: 30px;
    padding: 0 6px;
    gap: 3px;
  }
  
  .balance-ton-icon {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .balance-add-icon {
    width: 14px !important;
    height: 14px !important;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn svg {
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.75rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(90px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .games-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .game-card {
    padding: 14px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 68px;
    width: 68px;
    transform: translateY(-14px);
    margin: 0 12px;
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-16px) scale(1.05);
  }
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∞ —ç–∫—Ä–∞–Ω–∞ */
@media (orientation: landscape) and (max-height: 500px) {
  .app-header {
    height: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
  }
  
  .profile-header {
    height: 54px;
    padding: 0 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-left {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-avatar {
    width: 26px !important;
    height: 26px !important;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .avatar-img {
    width: 26px !important;
    height: 26px !important;
  }
  
  .avatar-fallback {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .profile-name {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  
  .profile-rating {
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .profile-right {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .profile-balance {
    height: 26px;
    padding: 0 5px;
    gap: 2px;
  }
  
  .balance-ton-icon {
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
  }
  
  .balance-value {
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .balance-add-icon {
    width: 14px !important;
    height: 14px !important;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn {
    width: 26px;
    height: 26px;
  }
  
  .profile-menu-btn svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }
  
  .app-content {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    top: calc(54px + var(--safe-top));
    bottom: calc(80px + var(--safe-bottom));
  }
  
  .app-footer {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: calc(var(--safe-bottom) + 0.5rem);
  }
  
  .footer-button.main-button {
    height: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    transform: translateY(-12px);
  }
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(10px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.game-card {
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–æ–∫—É—Å–∞ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
.game-filter-btn:focus,
.game-join-btn:focus,
.footer-button:focus,
.profile-menu-btn:focus,
.create-game-btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--text-color-accent);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ–º—ã (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ) */
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --color-base-bg: #ffffff;
    --color-secondary-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
    --color-input-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --text-color-primary: #000000;
    --text-color-secondary: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    --color-divider: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    --color-secondary-button-text: #000000;
  }
}

/* –£–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
.game-card,
.game-filter-btn,
.footer-button,
.profile-menu-btn,
.create-game-btn {
  will-change: transform;
}

/* –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–≥–æ DPI */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi) {
  .game-card {
    border-width: 0.5px;
  }
}

```css
/* CSS –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–º */
:root {
  /* –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-base-bg: #1a1a2e;
  --color-secondary-bg: rgba(26, 26, 46, 0.95);
  --color-input-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-primary-button-bg: #2481cc;
  --color-primary-button-text: #ffffff;
  --color-secondary-button-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-secondary-button-text: #ffffff;
  
  /* –¶–≤–µ—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ */
  --text-color-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-color-secondary: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
  --text-color-accent: #2481cc;
  --text-color-error: #ff6b6b;
  --text-color-success: #51cf66;
  --text-color-light: #ffffff;
  --text-color-dark: #000000;
  
  /* –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-divider: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --color-filter-badge-bg: #2481cc;
  --color-filter-badge-text: #ffffff;
  --color-slider-track-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  
  /* –ò–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–∞ */
  --color-game-card-bg: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.1);
  --color-game-card-border: rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.3);
  --color-ton-accent: #ffd700;
  --color-win: #51cf66;
  --color-lose: #ff6b6b;
  
  /* –¢–µ–Ω–∏ */
  --shadow-light: 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  --shadow-medium: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --shadow-heavy: 0 0 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --shadow-game-card: 0 4px 15px rgba(36, 129, 204, 0.2);
  
  /* Telegram Safe Areas - —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è SDK –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ */
  /* –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º Telegram-—Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏—Ñ–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è –ª—É—á—à–µ–π —Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ */
  --safe-top: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-top, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-top, env(safe-area-inset-top, 0px)));
  --safe-bottom: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-bottom, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-bottom, env(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0px)));
  --safe-left: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-left, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-left, env(safe-area-inset-left, 0px)));
  --safe-right: var(--tg-content-safe-area-inset-right, var(--tg-safe-area-inset-right, env(safe-area-inset-right, 0px)));
  
  /* –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≤—ã—Å–æ—Ç–∞ viewport –æ—Ç Telegram */
  --stable-height: var(--tg-viewport-stable-height, 100vh);
}

/* –°–±—Ä–æ—Å —Å—Ç–∏–ª–µ–π */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  overscroll-behavior: none !important;
}

body {
  background: var(--color-base-bg);
  color: var(--text-color-primary);
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Roboto', 'Oxygen',
    'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue',
    sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è */
.app-container {

.profile-menu-btn {

/* –ö–û–ù–¢–ï–ù–¢ */
.app-content {
  position: fixed;

/* –§–ò–õ–¨–¢–†–´ –ò–ì–† */
.game-filters {

.game-header {
